response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, craftsmanship, and potential impact on your endeavors. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000, a generous discount that I believe will be attractive given its unparalleled quality and benefits. I look forward to discussing how this product could elevate your business or personal projects. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
